00001 /*! \file threadqueue.h
00002  * This file defines operations on thread queues.
00003  */
00004 
00005 #ifndef _THREADQUEUE_H_
00006 #define _THREADQUEUE_H_
00007 
00008 #include "kernel.h"
00009 
00010 struct thread_queue
00011 {
00012  int head;  /*!< The index to the head of the thread queue.
00013                  Is -1 if queue is empty. */
00014  int tail;  /*!< The index to the tail of the thread queue.
00015                  Is -1 if queue is empty. */
00016 };
00017 /*!< Describes a queue of threads. */
00018 
00019 /*! Initialize a thread queue. */
00020 extern void
00021 thread_queue_init(struct thread_queue* const queue_ptr
00022                   /*!< Points to the thread queue to be initialized. */);
00023 
00024 /*! Enqueue one thread into the thread queue. The thread will be placed at
00025     the end of the queue. */
00026 extern void
00027 thread_queue_enqueue(struct thread_queue* const queue_ptr
00028                     /*!< Points to the thread queue. */,
00029                     const int thread_index
00030                     /*!< Index, into thread_table, of the thread to be
00031                          inserted into the thread queue. */);
00032 
00033 /*! Remove the  head of the queue. \returns the index, into thread_table, of
00034     the thread removed from the thread queue.*/
00035 extern int
00036 thread_queue_dequeue(struct thread_queue* const queue_ptr
00037                     /*!< Points to the thread queue. */);
00038 
00039 /*! Checks if the queue is empty. \returns 1 if the queue is empty.
00040     Returns 0 otherwise. */
00041 extern int
00042 thread_queue_is_empty(const struct thread_queue* const queue_ptr
00043                       /*!< Points to the thread queue. */);
00044 
00045 /*! Returns the first thread in the thread_queue. \returns the index, into
00046     thread_table, of the first thread in the thread_queue or -1 if the queue
00047     is empty. */
00048 extern int
00049 thread_queue_head(const struct thread_queue* const queue_ptr
00050                   /*!< Points to the thread queue. */);
00051 #endif
